rows.label: bf07230100_0010
rows.name: We have to cross that?

rows.label: bf07230100_0020
rows.name: Yes. Proceed with caution from here on.

rows.label: bf07230100_0030
rows.name:
Once inside,
blades will lose most of their power.

rows.label: bf07230100_0040
rows.name:
In some cases their energy might run out
and they'll return to their core.

rows.label: bf07230100_0050
rows.name:
And there's a chance they 
could never be resonated with again.

rows.label: bf07230100_0060
rows.name: Saika, you'd better just stay here and guard the fort.

rows.label: bf07230100_0070
rows.name: Why? Why only me?

rows.label: bf07230100_0080
rows.name: Why, why... You know best yourself, don't you?

rows.label: bf07230100_0090
rows.name: If that's the case, then the Prince too...

rows.label: bf07230100_0100
rows.name: I'll be fine.

rows.label: bf07230100_0110
rows.name: Then I'll also...

rows.label: bf07230100_0120
rows.name: I told you no, didn't I?

rows.label: bf07230100_0130
rows.name: Is there something wrong?

rows.label: bf07230100_0140
rows.name: It's nothing major. It's our business.

rows.label: bf07230100_0150
rows.name: Nuh-uh. I'm going with you!

rows.label: bf07230100_0160
rows.name:
We made a promise back then, didn't we?
Don't tell me you've forgotten.

rows.label: bf07230100_0170
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]

rows.label: bf07230100_0180
rows.name:
If the Prince goes, I go too.
Okay? That's final.

rows.label: bf07230100_0190
rows.name: Do as you please...

rows.label: bf07230100_0200
rows.name: My lady...

rows.label: bf07230100_0210
rows.name:
I'm fine.
We can't stop here.

rows.label: bf07230100_0220
rows.name: Byakko, we're not having that conversation, okay?

rows.label: bf07230100_0230
rows.name: I... Understood.

rows.label: bf07230100_0240
rows.name: We don't know what's inside.

rows.label: bf07230100_0250
rows.name:
In addition, except for Tora and Hana,
our Arts will be significantly weakened.

rows.label: bf07230100_0260
rows.name: Be careful, Rex.

rows.label: bf07230100_0270
rows.name:
That's right. 
Healing Arts will also be less effective.

rows.label: bf07230100_0280
rows.name: If you get seriously injured, that's the end.

rows.label: bf07230100_0290
rows.name:
Yeah, I get that.
Tora, Hana, we'll need you on the front line.

rows.label: bf07230100_0300
rows.name: Leave it to me, Boss!

rows.label: bf07230100_0310
rows.name:
Since Hana is an artificial Blade, there's
absolutely, totally not even a tiny bit of worry[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: bf07230100_0320
rows.name:
Technology save the day!
Three cheers for Nopon know-how!

rows.label: bf07230100_0330
rows.name: Hmph!

rows.label: bf07230100_0340
rows.name: Hahaha, I'm counting on you.
